attributes.action: Urge the Fiver to bring back its much-missed Tv and Radio guide, that wasn't much use as a tv and Radio Guide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In January 2007 (or was it December 2006?) the Guardian's football tea-time email, The Fiver, stopped publishing its TV and Radio Guide. Historically, its list of recommended viewing items was interspersed with occasionally amusing contributions from its readers. I never got anything published in the TVARG, but I still hope that, maybe one day, I can make someone chuckle with a tale about how I got irresponsibly drunk one night and woke up the next morning  with a badger nibbling my earlobe, or some other such shenanigens, while said reader serches for something to watch on the TV in the hope that it might ease the soul-destroying existential agony of modern Britain.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
